title: Why the Donald Trump biopic 'The Apprentice' was made and the ironic reason it needed a Kickstarter to cover legal fees
description: Sebastian Stan, Jeremy Strong, Maria Bakalova and Ali Abbasi go into detail on the reason they made the 'The Apprentice' and how Donald Trump tried to stop it from being seen.
excerpt: We literally went from, "This is a movie that I would like Donald to watch," to, "This is a movie that Donald doesn't want anyone to watch."
text: We literally went from, "This is a movie that I would like Donald to watch," to, "This is a movie that Donald doesn't want anyone to watch."
